title: Daisy Lowe shows off her dance moves at the Ghost Fragrances home launch
text:
She is rumoured to be dating musician Jack Peñate.

Yet Daisy Lowe appeared to be flying solo as she attended the Ghost Fragrances home launch at The Ace Hotel in London on Thursday evening.

The model, 30, showcased her playful side as she flaunted some of her dance moves for the camera while inside the glitzy star-studded bash.

Moves like Daisy! Daisy Lowe appeared to be flying solo as she attended the Ghost Fragrances home launch at The Ace Hotel in London on Thursday evening

Daisy oozed elegance in the midnight blue wrap dress which was tied around her svelte midriff and showcased her stunning hourglass physique.

The former Strictly contestant opted to accessorise with a selection of delicate gold pendant chain necklaces, but kept her look simple and elegant.

She swept her raven locks up into a chic messy bun, while adding soft touches of make-up to her pretty visage.

Beaming: The model, 30, showcased her playful side as she flaunted some of her dance moves for the camera while inside the glitzy star-studded bash

Glam: The former Strictly contestant opted to accessorise with a selection of delicate gold pendant chain necklaces, but kept her look simple and elegant

Racy: Daisy was accompanied at the bash by Donna Air, who looked super sexy in a black polo neck jumper which she had tucked into a figure-hugging leather midi skirt

Reality line-up: Elsewhere, reality starlets Camilla Thurlow, Francesca Allen and Rosie Fortescue were also in attendance at the event along with Loose Women's Andrea McLean

Daisy was accompanied at the bash by Donna Air, who looked super sexy in a black polo neck jumper which she had tucked into a figure-hugging leather midi skirt.

Elsewhere, reality starlets Camilla Thurlow, Francesca Allen and Rosie Fortescue were also in attendance at the event along with Loose Women's Andrea McLean.

Daisy's outing comes just days after she was pictured with her apparent new boyfriend Jack strolling through a London park with their pooches.

The model recently split from beau Cameron McMeikan, 24, who she dated for almost a year before reportedly splitting over their six-year age gap.

Flower girl: Francesca Allen looked sophisticated in a tweed jacket and flared black jeans

Cute: Camilla looked lovely in a butterfly print mini dress and black knee-high boots

Smoulder: Rosie Fortescue looked typically stylish in a pinstripe blazer and distressed jeans

Glam: Malaika Firth rocked a grey blazer jacket and a pair of suede knee-high boots

However it appears that she has already moved on with the Torn On The Platform hitmaker judging by their cosy display during their recent outing.

Daisy was last pictured with Jack in 2014, suggesting that they have been pals for a long time before sparking a romantic connection.

Daisy, whose dating history includes The Crown's Matt Smith, Hurts singer Theo Hutchcraft and Thomas Cohen, was previously romantically linked to artist John Leigh before Cameron.

Smiley: Kate Thornton opted for a maxi shirt dress which was covered in flecs of white

Leopard lady: Andrea Mclean wowed in a thigh-skimming leopard print mini and leather jacket
description: The model, 30, showcased her playful side as she flaunted some of her dance moves for the camera while inside the glitzy star-studded bash.
